author: sky.cactus

author: protolambda
content: Happy to publish audit logs btw, aside from banning bots, I think we've banned less than 10 or so in the past year

author: sky.cactus

author: keccack256
content: <@301186049323958275> do you know if the Geth discord is monitored much anymore? Got a question re: freezer dir slowing down sync

author: keccack256
content: Posted it there yesterday but doesnt look like much activity going on there in general as of late

author: sky.cactus
content: Sadly, I think there are relatively few Geth experts and they are Geth maintainers and super busy, so not much time available to answer questions.

author: sky.cactus
content: Geth's lack of developer resources is a known and real problem.

author: pintail_xyz
content: I'm just about to hit publsh on my EIP-1559 article but I wanted to stick a generic Ethereum graphic on there, just so it shows up more clearly on Medium. Is there are stock of free-to-use graphics somewhere?

author: pintail_xyz
content: Are the images in https://github.com/ethereum/ethereum-org-website free to use for example?

author: sky.cactus
content: MIT license according to LICENSE file.

author: pintail_xyz
content: and that applies equally to images as to code?

author: pintail_xyz
content: From stack exchange: "There is nothing in principle that would make the MIT license inapplicable to images, as long as they are subject to copyright."

author: pintail_xyz
content: I'm going to take it as a yes I think

author: sky.cactus
content: If you aren't being a dick on the internet with the content, I *doubt* anyone will complain.  ðŸ˜¬
